mapper.select: SELECT mc.member_coupon_id AS memberCouponId, mc.coupon_id AS couponId, mc.parking_lot_id AS parkingLotId, mc.status AS status, mc.created_date AS createdDate, c.discount_hour AS discountHour, c.end_date AS endDate FROM member_coupon mc INNER JOIN coupon c ON mc.coupon_id = c.coupon_id WHERE mc.member_id = #{memberId} AND mc.used_date IS NULL AND mc.status = 'ACTIVE'
